Desc.entry: An independent charity helping young people and adults to achieve their full potential in learning, employment and life. Works extensively with young people and adults in Sheffield providing support services, activities around education, employment, personal development and social inclusion. Works with a wide range of partners across the city including voluntary sector and statutory agencies. Company limited by guarantee no 2963378.

Telephone.entry: Freephone information line young people aged 13-19 years

category.entry: EDUCATION - TRAINING PROVIDERS AND EMPLOYMENT SUPPORT
